item.description:
This event will be tons of fun!! as it will be a cross meetup with other fun groups so Cupid better be ready!!!

All the girls are required to dress in red or white, red and white or better yet, in a valentine's costume!

IF you have a significant other, you are welcome to bring him/her along but please! not (too much) PDA allowed, we will be jealous!

The price is $10 per person and you must pay in advance thru paypal if you want to get a discount. Price is $20 at the door . Please submit the payment as "personal transfer" so you don't get charged a transaction fee.

 

 

* Light hors d'oeuvres from 7 - 9pm

* DJ spinning top 40 dance music all night long

* Best & worst pick up line contest for 2013 - see below

* Crowning of Boston's biggest flirts for 2013 - see below

Over $1000 in prizes!

 

This event will sell out!

 

Check out the 2012 Sexy Flirt finalists on the webpage!!!

Winners are chosen by voting that is open to the general public and nominees/friends can spread

Click here to nominate yourself or someone else as a

2013 flirt or enter your best/worst line
item.name: Flirt Fest On Valentine's day!!
